question: Joshua has 90 hectares of grapes field. There are 58 grapess per hectare. Joshua can harvest his grapess every 12 months. How many grapess can Joshua harvest within a year?
answer:
Joshua has 58*90= <<58*90=5220>>5220 grapess on his field.
Joshua can harvest his grapess 12 / 12 = <<12/12=1>>1 times per year
Therefore Joshua can harvest 5220*1 = <<5220*1=5220>>5220 grapess per year.
#### 5220
